member.name: CRYPT_VERIFY_CERT_SIGN_STRONG_PROPERTIES_INFO
member.summary: Contains the length, in bits, of the public key and the names of the signing and hashing algorithms used for strong signing.

member.name: CRYPT_VERIFY_CERT_SIGN_STRONG_PROPERTIES_INFO.CertSignHashCNGAlgPropData
member.summary: The buffer contains a Unicode string that denotes the signing algorithm / hashing algorithm pair used, for example "RSA/SHA256".

member.name: CRYPT_VERIFY_CERT_SIGN_STRONG_PROPERTIES_INFO.CertIssuerPubKeyBitLengthPropData
member.summary: The buffer contains the length, in bits, of the asymmetric key used for signing.
